title: To the Ezreals with TPs...
body:
Guys... you're not on the pro scene...

The pros are using it because they're highly co-ordinated. Just go heal.

Going TP won't make you Uzi or Pray suddenly...

It is actually quite sad and pathetic, the instant switch, no questions asked.

replies.body: It doesn't come down to who or isn't on the pro scene. The meta is heavily influenced by the pro scene. If someone is comfortable with taking TP on Ezreal, who are to dictate that they can't?
